statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.Description , AA.DescriptionRTF
FROM dbo.TGoodsDetail AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.Description , AA.DescriptionRTF
FROM dbo.TGoodsDetail AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TGoodsDetail ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, GoodsID, Description, DescriptionRTF ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #GoodsID#, #Description#, #DescriptionRTF# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TGoodsDetail SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , Description = #Description# , DescriptionRTF = #DescriptionRTF# WHERE ID = #ID#
